author: joyvoister
content:
hello guys, good afternoon.. 

I want to build a public testnet on a VM that anyone can participate in validating to my public blockchain,
by utilizing tools from 
https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-genesis-generator for all config testnet
https://github.com/protolambda/eth2-bootnode for built ENR bootnodes.

after all configs are made. what is the next step sir?
